title: Was there coverage of the 2010 Castles & Scoops (Wilmington Children\'s Museum) and CANstruction (NC Food Bank) charity fundraising events from  last weekend?  Who were the winners?  How much money was raised?
text:
The Castles & Scoops event was canceled.



Here's a link to Canstruction coverage at StarNewsOnline.com:

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100818/ARTICLES/100819601
